TopicTitle: [Stock craft] The Phoenix and a research outpost

Articles.Content:
Thought I would share my latest creations!

First is the Phoenix. Tested on Minmus and the Mun, this craft was inspired by Zefram Cochrane's Phoenix warp ship. Part count: 142

craft file: http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/phoenix-nx-03/

(larger: http://i.imgur.com/UM0kg6Q.jpg )

And a research outpost. Tested only on Minmus. Capsule detaches via docking port on top of outpost. Part count: 136

craft file: http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/research-outpost/

(larger: http://i.imgur.com/X8u5poH.jpg )

(larger: http://i.imgur.com/Ei0h9Zl.jpg )
